data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about staying within a budget.
data.answer: I'm going to talk about staying within a budget. I feel that everyone should have their own budget. Even the development of the company needs to make a budget. Making a budget is the best way for individuals to reasonably arrange their income and expenditure. Keeping it within the budget is conducive to the rational distribution of personal property. Budgeting helps managers set goals through plans to cope with various situations. At the same time, making plans is also conducive to coordinating organizational activities, which is an effective means of communication. The formulation of a budget is also conducive to coordinating the allocation and utilization of all resources of enterprises to adapt to the development of the external economy.

options.content: Why is it important to stay within a budget?
Do you have a personal budget?
